proposal1.heroHeadline: ThriveLine is losing 300 hours a year on proposals. Here's where the time drains away.
proposal1.heroSubheadline: Your current proposals take hours to craft manually. With our system, it's just 47 seconds.
proposal1.problemsIntro: Every minute spent manually crafting proposals is a minute lost to inefficiency.

problems.title: Time Drain
problems.description: Each proposal takes 5 hours to create. That's 300 hours a year you could invest in client work.

problems.title: Missed Opportunities
problems.description: With manual proposals, responses are slow. This delay costs potential clients who move on to competitors.

problems.title: Brand Inconsistency
problems.description: Inconsistent proposals damage your brand. Each misstep can cost you the trust of a potential client.

problems.title: High Labor Costs
problems.description: Manual proposals waste labor hours. At $50/hour, that's $15,000 a year down the drain.

problems.title: Client Frustration
problems.description: Delayed proposals frustrate clients. Frustration leads to lost deals and damaged relationships.

problems.title: Competitive Disadvantage
problems.description: Competitors with faster proposals secure more deals. Every delayed proposal is a lost edge in the market.

proposal1.solutionIntro: Our AI automation system eradicates these inefficiencies.

solutions.title: Instant Proposal Generation
solutions.description: Currently, proposals take hours. Our system creates them in 47 seconds.

solutions.title: Consistent Branding
solutions.description: Manually, branding can be inconsistent. Our system ensures every proposal aligns with your brand.

solutions.title: Reduced Labor Costs
solutions.description: Manual work is costly. Our system reduces labor expenses by automating the process.

solutions.title: Enhanced Client Experience
solutions.description: Currently, delays frustrate clients. Our rapid proposals delight them with speed and accuracy.

solutions.title: Competitive Edge
solutions.description: Manual proposals slow you down. Our system gives you the advantage of speed in the market.

proposal1.whyUsIntro: Four reasons this works. Not marketing claims. Engineering facts.

whyUsCards.title: Speed
whyUsCards.description: Every hour your team spends writing proposals is an hour not spent closing deals. This system gives those hours back. Lead data in, live proposal out, 60 seconds.

whyUsCards.title: Personalization
whyUsCards.description: Generic proposals get ignored. Personalized proposals close. The system reads each prospect's website and reflects their services, tone, and positioning back to them. Written from scratch, not templated.

whyUsCards.title: Ownership
whyUsCards.description: No monthly subscription bleeding your budget. No vendor deciding to raise prices or shut down. You own the source code, the infrastructure, and the data. Permanently.

whyUsCards.title: Support
whyUsCards.description: Personal onboarding, a video walkthrough your team can reference anytime, and one week of post-delivery support. You are not left figuring this out alone.

fearCards.title: You are probably thinking: our stack is complicated.
fearCards.sub: CRM, email, Sheets, Slack. The system connects to whatever you already use. No migration.

fearCards.title: You might be wondering if this breaks your current workflow.
fearCards.sub: It runs alongside everything you have. Nothing changes except the time you spend on proposals.

fearCards.title: You are concerned the output will not match your standards.
fearCards.sub: Revisions are part of the build. We configure, test, and refine until the output matches your bar exactly.

proposal1.teamIntro: Your point of contact. No handoffs, no account managers, no layers.

team.name: Ayush Chauhan
team.bio: Full-stack engineer specializing in AI automation for agencies and service businesses. Every engagement personally handled from architecture through deployment. 15+ systems built. Zero failed deliveries. Works async, ships fast.

proposal1.processIntro: What Working With Us Looks Like

process.title: Kickoff (Async or Call)
process.description: We map your workflow, services, and current proposal process. Can be a 15-minute call or handled entirely over email. By the end, we have everything needed to configure the system.

process.title: System Configuration
process.description: The engine gets configured with your services, pricing structure, tone of voice, and brand standards. Every proposal it generates will sound like your best strategist wrote it.

process.title: Build and QA
process.description: Test proposals generated and reviewed against your quality bar. Refinements continue until the output is indistinguishable from what your team produces manually.

process.title: Deployment and Handoff
process.description: Deployed to production with full infrastructure. You receive a video walkthrough, documentation, and complete source code. From this point, the system runs without us.

proposal1.pricingIntro: Two options. Both are one-time builds. No subscriptions, no recurring fees. You own the source code and infrastructure permanently.

pricing.name: Proposal Engine
pricing.subtitle: // Core System
pricing.description: Custom proposal automation configured for ThriveLine's services, voice, and pricing structure.

pricing.name: Engine + AI Chatbot
pricing.subtitle: // Recommended
pricing.description: Everything above, plus an AI sales assistant embedded in every proposal. Handles objections, answers questions, and books calls for ThriveLine around the clock.
features: AI chatbot on every proposal page

proposal1.ctaHeadline: See this running on your actual proposals.
proposal1.ctaDescription: Reply here or email Ayush directly. He will send the onboarding form. Takes about 10 minutes and the build starts the same day. Custom-configured for ThriveLine.

proposal2.heroHeadline: Transform Acme Corp's Digital Presence with ThriveLine's Expertise.
proposal2.heroSubheadline: Let's revamp your online strategy to convert visitors into loyal customers. Our tailored plan focuses on design and engagement.
proposal2.problemsIntro: Let's tackle the revenue slipping through your fingers.

problems.title: High Bounce Rate
problems.description: Every visitor who leaves without engaging is a potential sale lost. Your current bounce rate could be costing you thousands.

problems.title: Weak Brand Identity
problems.description: Inconsistent branding leads to a diluted brand message. This confusion might be turning potential clients away.

problems.title: Poor Mobile Experience
problems.description: Mobile users make up over 50% of web traffic. A non-responsive site is like closing your doors to half your audience.

problems.title: Slow Load Times
problems.description: Sites that load slowly frustrate users and lead to abandonment. Every second delay reduces conversions by 7%.

problems.title: Limited Social Engagement
problems.description: Social media is a powerful tool. A lack of engagement means missing out on a massive audience and potential customer base.

problems.title: Low SEO Visibility
problems.description: If you're not on the first page of search results, you're losing 75% of potential traffic to competitors.

proposal2.solutionIntro: Here's how ThriveLine can turn those losses into wins.

solutions.title: Web Design
solutions.description: We create stunning, responsive websites that captivate users and drive conversions.

solutions.title: SEO Optimization
solutions.description: Boost your site's visibility and attract more organic traffic with our proven SEO strategies.

solutions.title: Social Media Management
solutions.description: Engage your audience with curated content and active social interactions.

solutions.title: Brand Strategy
solutions.description: Develop a cohesive brand identity that resonates with your target audience and stands out.

proposal2.whyUsIntro: Why choose ThriveLine? We're all about making businesses shine online.

whyUsCards.title: Creative Excellence
whyUsCards.description: Our designs are not just beautiful; they're effective.

whyUsCards.title: Proven Results
whyUsCards.description: We have a track record of transforming businesses with our strategies.

whyUsCards.title: Client-Centric
whyUsCards.description: Your goals are our goals. We work closely with you every step of the way.

whyUsCards.title: Detail Oriented
whyUsCards.description: We sweat the small stuff, so you don't have to.

team.name: Marie-line Villers
team.bio: Marie-line leads our strategy and client relationships, ensuring all projects align with client goals and expectations.

process.title: Discovery & Research
process.description: We dive deep into understanding your brand and objectives.

process.title: Strategy Development

lead.company_description:
Transforming Kelowna Businesses Through Web Design & SEO Excellence.
From tailored websites to strategic local SEO, we empower Kelowna businesses to reach new heights online. Discover the difference a custom digital approach can make for your brand.
